title: Global Banking & Markets, Goldman Sachs Electronic Trading (GSET) DevOps Engineer, [Seniority], Associate, Stockholm
description:
**Job Description**
**Goldman Sachs**
 The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc. is a leading global investment banking, securities and investment management firm that provides a wide range of financial services to a substantial and diversified client base that includes corporations, financial institutions, governments, and individuals. Founded in 1869, the firm is headquartered in New York and maintains offices in all major financial centers around the world.
   

  

**Divisional Overview**
 Global Banking and Markets division provides financing, advisory, risk distribution, and hedging services for institutional and corporate clients. Within Global Banking and Markets, our equities professionals focus on delivering ideas, execution, and liquidity to a wide array of clients trading the entire range of equity products, including physical shares, ETFs, synthetic shares, baskets, options, and other derivatives. Our engineers play important roles in several areas within the division. Some engineers build automated trading platforms and algorithms for the firm and its clients, taking an active part in the increasing shift from voice to electronic trading. Others sit on trading desks, creating cutting-edge derivative pricing models, and developing empirical models to provide insight into market behavior. Still others develop systems and processes that assist with making the entire trade life cycle more seamless.
   

  

**GSET Engineering**
 Goldman Sachs Electronic Trading (GSET) offers a best-in-class comprehensive suite of trading strategies to help clients achieve their trading objectives and navigate a variety of market conditions leveraging historical analyses, quantitative models, and real-time market information. These strategies are built on a highly distributed, scalable, low latency trading platform, which processes billions of transactions daily in the low microsecond range, with minimal jitter. Our engineers are responsible for designing, building, and maintaining this trading platform as well as the strategies running on the platform, in a collaborative environment. The software our engineers write is of a very high standard: it is client and market facing with real time SLAs and can have high financial and regulatory impact. Some engineers focus on implementing the platform, its surrounding ecosystem and order management workflows, writing highly performant code and optimizing its interaction with the hardware and infrastructure it is executing on. Others work on building the trading models, signals and algorithmic logic which constitute the trading strategies.
   

  

**Who Are We Looking For**
 We are looking for strong engineers in the GSET DevOps space. The team owns the production plant and manages systems that process billions of dollars’ worth of trades every day. The team works to continuously improve processes and tools to achieve a quicker time to market for changes, increased stability, and reduced toil. The team also incorporates aspects of software engineering and applies it to trading operations problems. We push our own boundaries and challenge the status quo in others. Our main goal is to create scalable and resilient trading systems through best-in-class software change management. Our team supports and enhances user acceptance and production environments that are leveraged by clients and internal users for testing software and daily use.We want technical people that communicate well and have a passion for efficiency and automation, continually looking for ways to improve. As part of this effort, they will be expected to collaborate with colleagues across the world.
   

  

**YOUR IMPACT**
 Working as a member of the DevOps team, your focus will be ensuring high release velocity and stability for the trading applications. This critical role includes analysis of real-time trading issues and enhancing our processes. The role also entails planning and leading projects across the wider GSET team to accommodate change and deliver new functionality to our clients.
   

  

 The ideal candidate brings customer service excellency in their approach and have a solid understanding of distributed software systems. The role is adaptable to levels of seniority.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or related field
* Productive in programming with a focus on scripting and infrastructure as code
* Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic production environment
* Ability to challenge status quo and automate manual tasks
* Ability to drive complex change to completion in collaboration and independently
* Knowledge of basic networking concepts, topologies, and technologies
* Experience in working and supporting production platforms
* Experience or willingness to quickly learn large-scale automated testing and releasing
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
* Strong communication skills and the ability to work in a team


**Preferred Qualifications**
* C++ programming experience
* Hands-on experience in the release processes of large-scale software applications
* Good understanding of software development life cycle processes
* Strong grasp of computer networks with a good understanding of TCP/IP
* Application support experience within Linux environments
* Experience in application monitoring, performance, and capacity management in large-scale systems
* Working knowledge of order management systems


**Key Responsibilities**
* Ownership of our production services by measuring and monitoring availability, response times, and overall system health.
* Building tools for reducing toil and enhancing process efficiencies
* Support services before they go live through activities such as system design consulting, developing software platforms and frameworks, capacity planning and release reviews.
* Responsible for the successful deployment of certified code and new functionality into the production trading environment
* Facilitate communications between trading desks, strategists, engineers, and other support teams to manage unexpected or day-to-day issues
* Continuously improve availability, stability, and performance of systems
* Coordinate the analysis, troubleshooting and resolution of system issues via postmortems

title: QA-testare till IT-företag
description:
För en av våra kunder söker vi nu efter en QA-testare som kommer att ansvara för systemtester samt användaracceptans-testning. Du kommer leverera alltifrån testscheman, testplaner och rapporter samtidigt som du är delaktig i testningen och dokumenterar samt rapporterar under processens gång.
   

  

 Uppdraget är på heltid och pågår tillsvidare
   

  

**Dina arbetsuppgifter** 
 Som QA kommer du arbeta med att skapa och ändra testplaner för flera testfaser enligt given beskrivning. Du kommer bland annat arbeta med systemtestning och UAT. Du kommer arbeta med leveranser av testscheman, testplaner, testrapporter.
   

  

**Detta Innefattar Bland Annat Följande**
* Övergripande ansvar för testning för olika projekt
* Arbeta aktivt med testning
* Analysera, rapportera och logga testernas framgång och resultat
* Leda och delta i DCB - möten med externa parter
* Säkerhetsställa installationer i testmiljö och kommunicera med interna och externa parter
* Ansvara för daglig rapport kring processer och defekter för varje delsystem samt uppdatera status på processerna
* Ansvara för att hantera den slutgiltiga testrapporten
* Hålla dialog med testare och testanalytiker kring krav i processen


 Du arbetar aktivt för att uppnå exakta testresultat enligt given plan samt ser till att all aktivitet kopplat till testerna dokumenteras.
   

  

**Din profil och kvalifikationer** 
 För att lyckas i rollen är du en lagspelare som på ett nyfiket och ansvarsfullt sätt tar dig an nya projekt. Du arbetar strategiskt för att nå mål i tid och lämnar inget åt slumpen. Du drivs av att se lösningar istället för problem och att motivera ett team är inget nytt för dig. Vi ser gärna att du har tidigare erfarenhet av att kommunicera med intressanter och tredjeparter.
   

  

*Krav*
* Gedigen erfarenhet av QA-testning
* Ansvarat över egna projekt inom området
* Planerat och följt testplaner
* Tidigare agerat ledare i DCB-möten
* Kunskap i Jira
* Arbetat i större testprojekt där samarbete med externa parter har förekommit


 Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
   

  

**Vad vi erbjuder** 
 På Centric får du de verktyg du behöver för att nå dina mål. Vi erbjuder alla våra konsulter kvalificerade utbildningar och certifieringar inom den senaste tekniken. Vi sätter stort värde på att våra medarbetare hela tiden ska fortsätta att utvecklas. Därför erbjuder vi dig möjligheten att lägga upp en individuell utbildningsplan, där vi bekostar såväl studiematerial som själva certifieringarna. Under din utveckling kommer vi matcha din kompetens mot rätt uppdrag i takt med att du avancerar. Vi genomför regelbundet spännande och roliga aktiviteter där du som konsult får möjlighet att träffa och umgås med dina kollegor under trevliga och avslappnande former.
   

  

*Mer om oss*
 Centric är ett IT-företag med 380 anställda, och med kontor i Stockholm, Göteborg, Malmö, Linköping och Örebro. Vi specialiserar oss på uthyrning av generalister och förmedling av specialister samt erbjuder outsourcing och systemlösningar inom retail. Vi är medlem i Almega Kompetensföretagen och följer deras kollektivavtal med Unionen.

title: Global Banking & Markets, Goldman Sachs Electronic Trading (GSET) DevOps Engineer, [Seniority], VP, Stockholm

* Facilitate communications between trading desks, strategists, engineers, and other support teams to manage unexpected or day-to-day issues
* Continuously improve availability, stability, and performance of systems
* Coordinate the analysis, troubleshooting and resolution of system issues via postmortems

title: Project Coordinator
description:
**Project Coordinator, Scania Project Office**
 Are you at your best when you make things happen? Do you like structure and are familiar with compiling data into manageable presentations? Would you enjoy working in an international environment and collaborating with colleagues from Volkswagen and Traton Group?
   

  

**Who We Are**
 We are a great team working in a global environment with solution development of Scania’s and Traton’s trucks and buses. With our mix of backgrounds, experiences, and competencies we exchange knowledge and experience to support each other. We are motivated by finding solutions together and always try to deliver the best solutions to contribute to Scania´s success. We are acknowledged as the best place to develop your leadership skills, business contribution, and Traton network with exceptional Team spirit.
   

  

**What We Offer**
 We offer an interesting job as a Project Coordinator, a central role in the project team. Besides being part of your team you will even be part of the Project Coordinator community at the Project Office which today consists of 16 project coordinators.
   

  

 Project Coordinators are supporting the project teams in different topics, for example
   

  

  

* Coordinate test plans, finance, product cost, etc.
* Compile reports of project status
* Moderate cross-functional follow-up meetings to secure delivery
* Work closely together with project managers and umbrella managers with different tasks
* Improve the way of working together with other Project Coordinators and umbrella teams
* Coordinate SOP vehicles
* Coordinate and follow up Release Stops


 Our corporate culture is characterized by openness, diversity, and respect for the individual.
   

  

 You will get freedom with responsibility within your role. As an employee at Scania, in addition to career and development opportunities, we also offer other benefits such as free training at Scania's health center Gröndal or wellness allowance, performance bonus, occupational pension, flexible working hours, internal and external courses, supplier visits, lunch at a reduced price, the opportunity for a staff car.
   

  

 We also offer hybrid work opportunities where it is possible to work from home or other places when work allows, such as our co-working space Scania Sergel in central Stockholm. For Scania employees, we have a direct bus between Stockholm Central and Södertälje via Liljeholmen for fast and convenient commuting when you work at the office in Södertälje.
   

  

**Your profile**
 As a person you are driven, curious, and well-structured. You thrive working, both in teams and individually, in a dynamic world where agile and conventional development methods co-exist. Facilitating meetings and presenting in larger groups in Swedish and English (written and oral) is something you feel comfortable with.
   

  

 You have a relevant education from University and experience in product development and project management. If you have previous experience in Scania product development it is a plus.
   

  

**As your new manager**
 With my background at Scania, I strongly believe in team effort and I am committed to all of Scania’s leadership principles. The Teams are built up by all the fantastic individuals that make things happen, I expect everyone to take responsibility for their assignment and ask for help when needed.
   

  

 Looking forward to your application!
   

  

**For more information**
 If you have any questions in regards to this position, please contact:
   

  

 Carl Lindquist, carl.lindquist@scania.com, Senior Manager & Head of Powertrain Integration, Chassis & Cabs.
   

  

**Application**
 Your application should include a CV, cover letter, and diplomas.
   

  

 Ongoing selection and interviews will take place during the application period therefore the position may be filled before the end of the application period 2024-05-27.
   

  

 We use logic and personality tests in our selection process and a background check may be conducted for this position.

title: Systemtekniker till Riksidrottsförbundet!
description:
Idrottsrörelsen är inne i en dynamisk förändringsprocess. Här drivs idrott i förening för att ha roligt, må bra och utvecklas hela livet och varje dag tar vi ännu ett steg på resan mot en mer nyfiken och välkomnande idrottsrörelse. IT-avdelningen ansvarar för att ge support till anställda och alla våra medlemsförbund samt förvaltar och utvecklar IT-miljön med fokus på säkerhet och tillgänglighet. Som System- och drifttekniker är du en viktig del i att säkerställa att idrottens medlemmar friktionsfritt kan arbeta med de digitala verktygen. Har du några års erfarenhet inom drift och är redo för nästa steg? Häng med på vår resa!
 



  

**Företag :**
 Sveriges Riksidrottsförbund
 



  

**Plats :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 IT
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid, 100%
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Enligt överenskommelse
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Rekrytering
 



  

**Övrigt :**
 Möjlighet till distansarbete
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Riksidrottsförbundet (RF) är idrottsrörelsens samlande organisation med uppgift att stödja, företräda, leda och samordna idrottsrörelsen i gemensamma frågor, såväl nationellt som internationellt. Riksidrottsförbundet har 72 medlemsförbund (specialidrottsförbund, SF) som tillsammans har cirka 19 000 idrottsföreningar och totalt samlar idrottsrörelsen cirka 3,3 miljoner medlemmar vilket innebär ett stort antal användare av förbundets digitala verktyg. Du kommer ett ingå i ett team om fyra personer samt din närmsta chef och ni jobbar tillsammans främst med driften av idrottens administrativa verksamhetssystem IdrottOnline, en integrationsplattform, Microsoft 365 samt den infrastruktur som krävs för den digitala arbetsplatsen. Dina kollegor finns på två olika arbetsplatser - Idrottens Hus vid Skanstull och Bosön på Lidingö. Arbete kan förekomma på bägge arbetsplatserna men du kommer främst att spendera din arbetstid på kontoret i Skanstull.
 


  


  

**Några ord från din framtida närmsta chef:**



  


 Hej, Jag heter Victoria och är IT-chef på Sveriges Riksidrottsförbund och SISU Idrottsutbildarna. När jag började här för drygt 2 år sedan möttes jag av en otroligt välkomnande och trevlig arbetsplats där alla arbetar för visionen Svensk idrott världens bästa. Digitaliseringen går snabbt och för att trivas här måste man vara lösningsfokuserad och inspireras av nya utmaningar. Inom verksamhetsområdet IT och Digital utveckling arbetar vi i nära samarbete med varandra vilket skapar en bra sammanhållning där vi både utvecklar och stöttar varandra i det dagliga arbetet och dess utmaningar. Som ledare är mitt mål att coacha och stötta mina medarbetare i att utmana sig själva och att utvecklas. Jag kommer att finnas där som bollplank för alla typer av frågor, från stöd i övergripande tekniska beslut till att hitta nya sätt att lösa utmaningar.
   

 Ta chansen och bli en del av vårt härliga team där vi tillsammans gör allt för att stötta hela Sveriges idrottsrörelse!
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* Arbete i en roll där du får jobba brett med olika uppgifter inom IT-drift
  
* Arbete i organisation där det händer mycket och som är under snabb utveckling vilket vi tror kommer ge dig goda möjligheter att utvecklas i din roll
  
* En välkomnande arbetsgivare som värnar om trivsel och välmående på arbetat genom att erbjuda möjligheten till tre dagars arbete på kontor och två dagars på distans per vecka (om arbetet tillåter), 2 timmars friskvård i veckan, 3000 kr i friskvårdsbidrag per år samt lunchförmåner. Här finns också en trivselgrupp vars uppgift är att skapar det där lilla extra sociala i vardagen på jobbet!
  


  


  

**Arbetsuppgifter**



  


 Du kommer huvudsakligen jobba med att hantera driften av IT-miljön vilket innebär övervakning, installation, uppgradering, konfigurering, utveckling samt optimering av infrastrukturen för IdrottOnline, integrationsplattformen samt Microsoft 365. Detta är en roll för dig och som vill jobba brett och lära dig nya tekniker och arbetssätt. Du kommer framförallt att jobba med drift av Windowsservrar men Riksidrottsförbundet jobbar utöver det bland annat med Linux, Cisco, Meraki, Docker, Kubernetes, Prometheus, Terraform, Gravitee, ArgoCD, Curity, Microsoft Dynamics 365 m.fl. och är det områden du inte kan sedan innan så är det något du kommer få utvecklas och lära dig mer inom här!
   




**Vi söker dig som**

 I denna rekrytering kommer vi lägga stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper och intresse för tjänsten och Riksidrottsförbundet som organisation. Vi ser att du är duktig på att samarbeta, du gillar att tänka nytt och att utveckla dig själv och att ta ansvar för såväl din egen utveckling som det gemensamma resultatet i teamet.
 


  


  

**Vidare har du…**



  

  
* Minst några års erfarenhet av drift, underhåll, konfigurering och felsökning av system och nätverk
  
* Kunskaper inom Windows Server
  
* Kunskaper inom Microsoft Azure
  
* Kunskaper inom DevOps
  
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska då det är det primära arbetsspråket
  


  


  

**Vi ser det som meriterande om du också har…**



  

  
* Kunskaper inom Kubernetes
  
* Kunskaper inom SQL
  
* Kunskaper inom Microsoft 365
  


  


  

**Rekryteringsprocessen**



  

  
* Telefonintervju med Academic Work
  
* Problem- och personlighetstester
  
* Djupintervju med Academic Work
  
* Intervjuer med Riksidrottsförbundet
  
* Referenstagning + beslut
  


  


  

**Övrig information**



  

  
* Placering: Skanstull, möjlighet till visst distansarbete
  
* Start: Enligt överenskommelse
  
* Omfattning: Heltid
  
* Kontaktuppgifter: Ansvarig rekryteringskonsult Johanna Sörell, johanna.sorell@academicwork.se
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
 


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Sveriges Riksidrottsförbund**

 Läs mer om Riksidrottsförbundet på deras hemsida !
   




**Bli direktrekryterad till Sveriges Riksidrottsförbund**

 Detta är en direktrekrytering, vilket betyder att den kandidat som får tjänsten blir direktanställd av kundföretaget. Rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av Academic Work.
   




**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Johanna Sörell eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på stv3@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15106090

title: IT Dispatcher
description:
Är du redo för nästa utmaning? Vi söker en affärsmässig Senior Dispatcher till vår kunds Servicedesk i Stockholm eller Malmö!
   

  

**OM ROLLEN**
 Här får du en nyckelroll där du inte bara optimerar arbetsflöden utan också driver affärsutveckling och säkerställer att kunden överträffar förväntningar som ställs på de. I rollen kommer du att stödja och vägleda servicedeskteamet i deras dagliga arbete samt bidra till deras kompetensutveckling.
   

  

 I arbetsuppgifterna ingår även att:
   

  

* Säkerställa att inkommande ärenden hanteras effektivt och att SLA efterlevs.
* Analysera och rapportera ärendeflöden, identifiera trender och förbättringsmöjligheter.
* Du kommer ha ett nära samarbeta med andra avdelningen för att maximera värdet för deras kunder och förbättra kundnöjdheten.


**OM DIG**
 Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet av att arbeta i en supportfunktion där du är van att hantera flera uppgifter samtidigt och snabbt lösa problem som uppstår. Du har tidigare erfarenhet av att leda team eller har arbetat i en dispatcher-roll. Dessutom har du en affärsmässig inställning och förstår vikten av att upprätthålla hög kundnöjdhet.
   

  

 PASSAR VI DIG?
   

  

 Wise IT arbetar med kompetensförsörjning inom IT. Vår uppgift är att hitta rätt person till rätt IT-jobb, genom rekrytering och konsulter. Vi tror på människan i en framtida teknikutveckling och brinner för att bygga relationer, inkludera fler i IT-branschen och naturligtvis matcha rätt kompetens till rätt uppdrag. Vi vill vara en självklar go-to career partner oavsett om kandidaten söker jobb i dagsläget eller inte. Vill du vara med på vår resa? Läs mer om oss, vår kultur och våra värderingar på vår karriärsida.
   

  

 ANSÖKAN
   

  

 Har du frågor eller funderingar får du gärna höra av dig till Sharmin Atroushi (sharmin.atroushi@wiseit.se). Vi tar inte emot ansökningar via mail då vi värnar om din personliga integritet. Du kan läsa mer om hur vi behandlar personuppgifter enligt GDPR i Wise Group-koncernens policy för behandling av personuppgifter.
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan ! 🌻

title: Facility Engineer
description:
**FACILITY ENGINEER FOR CRITICAL INFRASTRUCTURE IN STOCKHOLM**
 On behalf of Digital Realty, Kelly is searching for a Facility Engineer. The increasing demand for IT infrastructure is clear, the Stockholm campus and data centers are strategically located to meet the need for business-critical IT infrastructure. Digital Realty is a leading provider of data center services across the World. Do you have technical experience of critical infrastructure, an eye for detail and are a service orientated person? Then this is an excellent opportunity for you! Here you will be part of a global company in a fast-growing sector.
   

  

 Digital Realty is a company that understands the importance of keeping business-critical infrastructure running safely. In Facility they play a key role, ensuring everything in their data centers operates as it should for the customers. Their infrastructure consists of diesel generators, chillers, UPS, fire suppression systems and much more. It’s about understanding the importance of the data center infrastructure and collaborating closely with other teams across the business to maintain it effectively. This means you’ll be involved in a variety of tasks, with plenty of opportunities to develop your technical skills further as Digital Realty continues to bring new data centers online across Europe.
   

  

 You’ll combine technical versatility with a proactive approach to solving problems and finding solutions.
   

  

**Your Primary Work Tasks**
* Execute day-to-day monitoring of buildings and equipment, and report all building and customer defects.
* Support in the maintenance and repairs on buildings and equipment in accordance with routines, change requests, drawings, Method of Procedure (MOP) and Service Level Agreement (SLA's).
* Respond to alarms and manage them according to guidelines.
* Provide practical guidance to external security personnel.
* Monitors performance of equipment and installations and co-provides input on power usage and capacity planning. Provides data for input into reports, such as electric meter data.
* Maintain communication with contractors and track any issues.
* Support commissioning activities for equipment and systems with focus on documentation.


**Professional Qualifications**
* Preferably 3-5 years of experience as Technical Engineer in data center infrastructure or location with similar infrastructure.
* Education as Electrician, Electrical or Mechanical Engineer, Marine Engineer or similar.
* In-depth knowledge of electrical power supply and climate control systems.
* Experience with generator and chiller maintenance.
* Strong computer skills.
* Good communication skills in Swedish and English, verbally and in writing.


**Personal Qualifications**
* You adapt to systems easily and are able to get an overview and understand complex settings.
* You are used to work in an environment where quality and security is key.
* You need to be attentive of details, have a problem-solving approach and great at meeting deadlines and quality expectations.
* In this position you’ll be collaborating closely with customers, suppliers and colleagues, so an outgoing and service-minded personality is key.


**WORKING HOURS**
 In the position as Facility Engineer, you work primarily during office hours, but the role also includes certain weeks of standby time. We therefore see that you who are applying have a driving license and access to a car and live within 1 hour of our site.
   

  

**YOU ARE OFFERED**
* A rapidly evolving business sector offers the opportunity to be part of a courageous and passionate team who work together to understand and meet the changing needs of our global customers.
* Join Digital Realty and you’ll be part of a supportive and inclusive environment where you can bring your whole self to work. As part of the facility team, you’ll get to collaborate with people from different business areas, challenge the way things done and put your ideas into action.
* You will also be given plenty of development opportunities so you can build a rewardi

title: Security Operations Analyst
description:
At Sandvik Coromant, we’re looking for a Security Operations Analyst – a unique opportunity to be at the forefront of our cyber defense, where you will play a pivotal role in fortifying our security environment. What sets this role apart is its adaptability, this isn’t just a job; it’s an opportunity to craft your own path within the realm of cybersecurity.
   

  

**Some Words About Your New Team**
 We work in an environment that encourages continuous learning, values innovation, and fosters professional growth. Joining us means being part of a dedicated team where your expertise directly impacts our digital resilience, and your contributions shape the security landscape of Sandvik. If you’re passionate about cybersecurity, driven by challenges, and ready to make a significant impact, we invite you to apply. Together, let’s build a secure digital future!
   

  

**Your mission**
 As Security Operations Analyst, you work at the heart of our cyber defense, as you take part in the identification and remediation of security vulnerabilities. This includes conducting post-incident analysis and risk mitigation and collaborating with our Global Security Operations Center and Cybersecurity Incident Management team to enhance our security posture. Using various tools and technologies, such as ServiceNow Vulnerability Remediation module, you prioritize and resolve security issues effectively and efficiently. You also contribute to the development and implementation of our security policies and best practices, as well as support our Security Champions in fostering a culture of security awareness within our agile processes and operations.
   

  

 Your main responsibilities include:
   

  

* Operating and maintaining our security and identity products.
* Monitoring and responding to security events and incidents in a timely manner.
* Conducting vulnerability assessments and managing the vulnerability remediation process.
* Performing thorough analysis of cybersecurity incidents, extracting key insights and implementing corrective actions to prevent recurrence.
* Proactively identifying potential risks and developing robust risk mitigation strategies in collaboration with cross-functional teams.
* Acting as a liaison between Sandvik Coromant and Sandvik’s broader security community, fostering collaborations, sharing knowledge, and staying abreast of industry best practices.


**Your profile**
 We’re looking for someone with a background within cybersecurity and incident management. A relevant university education is valuable, but experience and deep knowledge in the area is considered more important. Acting in locally in a truly global environment calls for excellent communication skills in both Swedish and English, verbally and in writing.
   

  

 When it comes to personality, we’re looking for someone who can build trust and rapport with various stakeholders, communicate clearly and effectively, and deliver results in a fast-paced environment. You have a keen eye for detail and a knack for solving complex problems with creative solutions. You’re also adaptable, open-minded, and resilient in the face of challenges and changes. Most importantly, you share our passion for innovation and security, and our commitment to diversity and collaboration.
   

  

**Our culture**
 Innovation is in our DNA and we’re proud to shape the future of manufacturing in close collaboration with our customers and partners. We believe in an inclusive, equal and open-minded culture, and we nurture our diversities to form a solid foundation for achieving great results. Add fair and rewarding benefits, as well as many different career opportunities in an inspiring global environment. Meet some of your future colleagues at our career page or visit our website, LinkedIn or Facebook page to get to know us further.
   

  

**Contact information**
 Are you curious to know more about this position? Please contact Tommy Påhls, recruiting manager, at +46 (0)72 215 21 40.
   

  

 We have already decided on which advertising channels and marketing campaigns we wish to use, and respectfully decline any additional contacts in that matter.
   

  

 Union contacts:
   

  

 Thomas Lilja, Unionen, +46 (0)70-261 04 82
   

  

 Göran Norell, Akademikerföreningen, +46 (0)70-616 43 78
   

  

 Peter Olsson-Andrée, Ledarna, +46 (0)70-222 48 55
   

  

 Recruitment Specialist: Anna Pettersen
   

  

**How To Apply**
 Send your application no later than August 30, 2024. Click apply and include your resume and cover letter in English. Please note that we don’t accept applications by e-mail. Job ID: R0067094.
   

  

 As we aim for a fair recruitment process, we utilize assessment tools to safeguard objectivity. When you apply for this job, you will therefore receive an invitation via email to a personality and logic ability test. Feedback comes immediately after the test has been completed and the selection process begins after the application deadline.
   

  

 To learn more about our recruitment process, please visit our career site or contact HR Services at hrservices.sweden@sandvik.com.
   

  

*Sandvik Coromant is part of the global industrial engineering group Sandvik and is at the forefront of developing manufacturing tools and machining solutions, with knowledge that drives the industry standards and innovations demanded by the metalworking industry now and in the next industrial era. Collaborations with educational institutions, extensive investment in research and development and strong customer partnership ensure the development of machining technologies that change, lead and drive the future of manufacturing. Sandvik Coromant owns over 1700 patents worldwide, employs around 8000 staff and is represented in more than 150 countries.*

title: Technical Support Engineer, Totogi (Remote) - $60,000/year USD
description:
Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, Totogi. Have you got what it takes?
   

  

 In the telecommunications industry, operational inefficiency and customer dissatisfaction are persistent issues, exacerbated by the complexity and volume of tasks that must be managed manually. Studies show that companies spend up to 30% of their operational budgets on manual task management, often resulting in service downtime and frustrated customers.
   

  

 Totogi is revolutionizing this landscape by leveraging cutting-edge, AI-driven systems to automate these tasks, significantly enhancing operational efficiency and customer satisfaction. By integrating advanced AI technology with deep technical expertise, we are not just solving problems reactively but proactively reshaping the entire support process. This approach is exciting because it sets a new standard in customer service efficiency and technical integration, making us a leader in the industry.
   

  

 This role is designed for those who thrive in high-tech, innovative environments. It is not a traditional engineering or support role; instead, it combines hands-on technical work with advanced AI tools to proactively optimize and automate complex support tasks. If you excel at scripting, system configuration, and deep technical troubleshooting, and are excited by the prospect of continuously improving processes through technology, this job is for you.
   

  

 In this role, you will be a crucial part of our dynamic team, implementing and managing AI-driven systems to enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction. You will configure and maintain network functions to ensure seamless service delivery, analyze data to derive actionable insights, and manage incidents to ensure timely resolution. Your work will directly contribute to our strategic decisions and elevate our customer support to new heights. If you are ready to empower your career with advanced AI technology and make a significant impact, we encourage you to apply and join our forward-thinking team.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
* AI System Building: Designing and implementing AI-driven systems and monitoring tools to enhance operational efficiency.
* Service Configuration and Maintenance: Using AI tools to configure AAA, PCRF, SMSC, and MMSC network functions, ensuring seamless service delivery and customer satisfaction.


**What You Won’t Be Doing**
* Answering the same questions over and over again
* Providing trivial or basic troubleshooting
* Writing knowledge base articles


**Technical Support Engineer Key Responsibilities**
* Enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction by optimizing and automating tasks using AI-driven systems and advanced technical skills


**Basic Requirements**
* Experience working with the following Telco network functions: AAA/PCRF/SMSC/MMSC
* Solid understanding of Radius, Diameter, SS7, and IMAP protocols
* Proficiency in Linux and Kubernetes
* Professional experience using generative AI tools (e.g. ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude) to boost productivity


**About Totogi**
 Totogi is focused on building telco software for the public cloud and is completely redefining how carriers engage with their subscribers to drive customer love! We are a product-driven telco software company made up of some of the best minds from the telecoms industry and the brightest engineering talent across the globe. Change the game with us.
   

  

 There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!
   

  

**Working with Crossover**
 This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $30 USD/hour, which equates to $60,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.
   

  

**What to expect next:**
* You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.
* Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.


**Important!** 
 If you do not receive an email from us:
   

  

* First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.
* Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.
* Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.
* If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/password-recovery if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.


 Crossover Job Code: LJ-5281-SE-Stockhol-TechnicalSuppo.004

title: Cloud Engineer - Stockholm
description:
World leader in engineering and R&D services, Capgemini Engineering combines its broad industry knowledge and cutting-edge technologies in digital and software to support the convergence of the physical and digital worlds. Coupled with the capabilities of the rest of the Group, it helps clients to accelerate their journey towards Intelligent Industry. Capgemini Engineering has more than 55,000 engineer and scientist team members in over 30 countries across sectors including Aeronautics, Space, Defense, Naval, Automotive, Rail, Infrastructure & Transportation, Energy, Utilities & Chemicals, Life Sciences, Communications, Semiconductor & Electronics, Industrial & Consumer, Software & Internet.
   

  

 Capgemini Engineering is an integral part of Capgemini, a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology. The Group is guided everyday by its purpose of unleashing human energy through technology for an inclusive and sustainable future. It is a responsible and diverse organization of over 360,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong 55-year heritage and deep industry expertise, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to address the entire breadth of their business needs, from strategy and design to operations, fueled by the fast evolving and innovative world of cloud, data AI, connectivity, software, digital engineering and platforms. The Group reported in 2022 global revenues of €22 billion.
   

  

**Cloud Engineer - Stockholm**
 The Cloud Engineer will, together with the highly skilled and driven team, enable the adoption and implementation of Cloud utilization and perform operations and development in a complex environment at scale. The position will allow not only to develop and utilize deep technical skills but also contribute to the implementation of the Public Cloud platform. We are looking for a person that will secure execution towards roadmap milestones and Cloud strategy. Design, implement and manage scalable, secure and resilient cloud infrastructure. Serve as a Developer on one or more cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure or others. Collaborate with architects to understand requirements, prioritize initiatives, and align cloud strategies with business objectives. Provide technical leadership, mentorship, and guidance to junior engineers and developers to foster a culture of innovation, learning and continuous improvement.
   

  

**Required Skills**
* Minumum Bachelor's degree in a relevant field such as Computer Science, Information Technology, Software Engineering
* Minimum 3-5 years of experience in implementation of application or enterprise design using IaC in Azure/AWS
* Minimum 1-2 years of experience in Azure/AWS enterprise landing zone design and implementation
* Experience with CI/CD tools such as Azure DevOps, Jenkins, GitLab CI or CircleCI
* Automate infrastructure provisioning, configuration management and application deployment using tools such as Terraform, CloudFormation and Ansible
* Implement best practices like Modulation/reusable in IaC (Terraform, Bisep, CloudFormation) code
* Proficient in scripting and automation using Python, Bash or similar languages
* Knowledge of containerization and orchestration tools like Docker and Kubernetes, Implement Application Infrastructure with AKS/EKS Services
* Familiarity with monitoring and logging tools such as Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack or CloudWatch Logs
* Familiar with the IAM service like Entra in Azure/IAM in AWS
* Experience in Security Audit (NIS 2/ISO standard) and best practices
* Implement Application using Microsoft/Amazon best practices
* Very good communication skills in English. Any Nordic language is advantageous
* Familiar with agile way of working and a team player
* Valid work permit for Sweden


**Nice To Have Skills**
* Certified as Azure/AWS Associate Eg Security and Networking
* FinOps Certified
* Terraform certified.
* Certified in Azure Security and Networking


**What We Offer**
 Capgemini Engineering is one of the world's leading consulting companies in R&D. We work in most industries globally. In Scandinavia, we focus mainly on Automotive, Manufacturing, Telecom and Life Science. We deliver, together with our global centers of expertise, solutions for both large global customers and smaller local start-up companies. Today we are part of the Capgemini Group, which gives us even more opportunities to find the right clients and projects. Based on the clients' needs, we provide expert competence, entire project groups, services and overall commitments. Always based on what best suits the client’s own organization and challenges.
   

  

 Capgemini Engineering offers you a work environment that is characterized by innovation. As a consultant at Capgemini Engineering, you are part of something bigger. We care about you as a colleague and offer you a safe and favorable employment. For us, the community is important and in addition to professional development, we offer you a variety of activities such as lunches, breakfasts, after works, sports events and more.
   

  

**Join us to Get The Future You Want!**
**Right now it's holiday season at Capgemini Engineering. We look forward to review your application upon our return in late August, and give you feedback as soon as we can after that. Thanks for your patience and have a great summer!**
 At Capgemini Engineering we value excellence, care, responsibility, dynamism and innovation. We offer a job with variation that leaves plenty of room for initiative and development. In fact, we are not just offering you a job, we’re inviting you to be part of our community where we will provide you trainings, tools & grounds for professional and personal growth. Each career experience is assorted by an attractive salary package.

title: Cloud Security Engineer
description:
**Welcome to Eficode!**
 We are building the future of software development - specializing in Cloud, DevOps, Agile, and Development. We help our customers transform into software-driven organizations, aiming to change the world by sharing our knowledge. Our employees value: opportunities for growth, psychological safety and culture - we appreciate our laid-back and autonomous, but supportive atmosphere.
   

  

**We’re on the lookout for a Cloud Security Engineer**
 Eficode is looking for an experienced Cloud Security Engineer for our Security Team. The role is primarily focused on securing our infrastructure and services within the Managed Services unit of Eficode, but is not limited to it.
   

  

**In This Role, You Will**
* Collaborate with managed services technical teams to support and guide security-related processes and tasks.
* Collaborate with customers on security-related topics.
* Take part in security awareness programs, developing and refining security processes, and incident management protocols.
* Conduct thorough security reporting and drive continuous improvement in our security practices within the business area.
* Integrate IT security controls into business operations.
* Take the lead in monitoring and responding to security incidents in our environments, ensuring swift detection and response.
* Coordinate response and recovery activities during incidents as part of our incident management efforts, ensuring continuous business operations.
* Collaborate with internal stakeholders to ensure optimal operation of our ISO 27001-certified security system.
* Mentor and train your colleagues on the industry's best practices.
* Develop our security practices and processes to help us scale further securely.
* Play a pivotal role in sustaining and enhancing the security posture of our systems and processes.
* Engage in proactive learning and development to stay ahead of security trends and technologies.
* Provide coaching and training to colleagues, fostering a culture of security awareness and competence.


**Who are we looking for?**
**Our Ideal Security Engineer Is Someone Who**
* Has a minimum 5 years relevant experience with a proven track record of success in IT security, specifically Cloud Security
* Is skilled in cybersecurity tools and software applications
* Has a strong focus on securing cloud-based infrastructure and services
* Holds an information technology or security degree (bachelor's or higher)
* Demonstrates analytical thinking capabilities and a problem-solving mindset
* Can communicate effectively in English
* Shares our continuous learning and knowledge-sharing culture
* Has experience with security process management and incident response
* Conducts training sessions and presentations
* Collaborates effectively with different teams, technical and non-technical


**It’s Advantageous If You Have**
* Previous experience in managed services environments.
* Experience with security certifications and frameworks such as CIS, NIST, ISO/IEC 27000 Series.


**Why Choose Eficode?**
* You’ll have the opportunity to contribute and participate in an exciting international growth story.
* Eficode is a hub of bright minds working on groundbreaking projects.
* We provide an environment that respects experience, nurtures talent, and encourages growth.
* Open collaboration and clear communication are the cornerstones of our culture.
* With our commitment to personal development, your growth never stops.
* Flexible Work: Tailor your work environment and schedule to fit your life best, with remote work options available.
* On top of your compensation, we offer fringe benefits that depend on your location.
* Possibility to explore life in another country through our international presence.


**Apply now to protect, innovate, and grow with us!**
 This is a full-time, hybrid remote role available in
 **Finland, Sweden, Poland, or the UK** 
 (please note that we hope you are already located in one of these countries).
   

  

 If this opportunity sparks your interest, please apply
 **by 1st of September 2024** 
 , we would love to hear from you!
   

  

*At Eficode we are committed to offering an inclusive recruitment process and equal opportunities for all applicants.*
*We are dedicated to creating a work environment that embraces diversity, inclusion, and respect for all employees. We believe that our differences make us better. We recognize that by having diverse perspectives, skills, ages, genders, backgrounds and cultures we will better drive our customers forward and innovate in our field.*
*To ensure a fair recruitment process, please refrain from sharing unnecessary personal information and your picture on your job application.*
*Eficode, better made possible.*

title: Backend Engineer
description:
At Platform24 we have an uncompromising focus on making every day better for both patients and clinicians and together create healthcare 2.0. Now we are looking for a senior Backend Engineer who wants to be a part of shaping what tomorrow's healthcare looks like.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
 As a Backend Engineer in one of our product engineering teams, you will have a key role in development of brand new features, contributing to architecture discussions, technology choices and communication of technical topics to non-technical stakeholders.
   

  

**A Sneak Peak Of Our Tech Stack**
* Java
* Quarkus
* Spring Boot
* Kubernetes
* GKE


**To Succeed In This Role We Believe You Have**
* Worked with Java and related frameworks
* Been involved in designing and building API’s and microservices
* Knowledge of relational database design and JPA/Hibernate


**What's in it for you?**
 At Platform24, we recognize that we all have different needs for planning our lives. That is why we believe in flexible working hours and a hybrid remote model to ensure work-life balance for everyone. Every other week we have Demo & Beers, where we share our accomplishments (beers optional :). We offer personal growth and knowledge-sharing sessions regularly and on top of lots of other nice benefits such as office snacks and parties, provide you the opportunity to use five work days a year to do voluntary work helping others.
   

  

 Besides this, you will get the chance to work with intelligent, friendly, and skilled colleagues from all over the world.
   

  

**About Platform24**
 Platform24 is a leading B2B health tech company in Europe, yet just at the beginning of our journey. By combining intelligent automation with deep medical knowledge, we build a platform that radically improves how healthcare is accessed and delivered. We are revolutionizing how healthcare is done in public and private healthcare with strong growth and presence across several European markets.
   

  

**(Please note that our team will be on vacation, which may cause some delays in our response times. We will be back by mid-August and will move the process forward as soon as we return).**
 Platform24 develops system support for cohesive digital care chains that facilitate increased accessibility, efficiency and medical security. We are the largest company in the Nordic region when it comes to automatic triage for directing patients to the right level of care and the right care unit, even in complex flows along the entire patient pathway.
   

  

 Our customers include healthcare regions, private care providers, and insurance companies.

title: Tysktalande teknisk innesäljare till internationellt företag!
Account Manager till Elovade
description:
Elovade är ett bolag som strävar efter att tillhandahålla de absolut bästa lösningarna inom IT i syfte att underlätta arbetet och öka lönsamheten hos sina partners. De önskar nu utöka teamet och söker efter en driven och hungrig Account Manager som vill växa in i rollen långsiktigt. Låter detta som någonting för dig? Sök då tjänsten redan idag då vi tillämpar ett löpande urval!
 



  

**Företag :**
 Elovade
 



  

**Plats :**
 Årsta
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 Försäljning
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Omgående
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Rekrytering
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Tjänsten som Account Manager på Elovade passar dig som vill ta steget in på ett spännande och växande It-företag. Elovade är en ledande mjukvarudistributör inom IT i Skandinavien, och med mångårig kompetens tillhandahåller dem marknadens smartaste och mest innovativa lösningar exklusivt till IT-Konsulter och interna IT-avdelningar. På Elovade får du möjlighet att jobba på ett bolag som är specialiserade inom IT-baserade affärs- och verksamhetslösningar med fokus på drift, övervakning och automatisering. Som Account Manager hos Elovade får du möjligheten att utveckla din kompetens inom området samt bli en del av ett företag där tekniken ligger i framkant. Du erbjuds även ett flexibelt arbete med möjlighet till distansarbete samt frihet under ansvar. Tjänsten är en direktrekrytering vilket innebär att rekryteringsprocessen sker genom Academic Work men du kommer att anställas direkt hos Elovade.
 


  


 I rollen kommer du främst att arbeta med försäljning på ett relationskapande sätt, med främst nya kunder. På sikt förväntas du ha god förståelse för Elovades tjänster, och då är det viktigt att du informerar och säljer in nya idéer till dina kunder samt att du agerar rådgivande vid diverse frågor. Ett axplock av dina ansvarsområden:
 


  

  
* Prospektering genom att söka upp och kontakta nya företag genom kalla samtal
  
* Identifiera kundbehov och affärsmöjligheter
  
* Genom virtuella webbmöten med dina kunder utför du gedigna behovsanalyser, bygger relationer och är en god ambassadör för Elovades varumärke
  
* Jobba mot personligt uppsatta säljmål
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**

 I den här rekryteringen kommer vi att lägga stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper, men för att kvalificera för tjänsten så tror vi att du har ca
   

**ett års erfarenhet av B2B försäljning**
 där det ingått arbetsuppgifter som prospektering, nykundsbearbetning och kalla samtal. Det är mycket meriterande om du har arbetat med försäljning inom IT. Det är även ett krav att du är flytande i svenska och engelska i tal och skrift, då arbetet utförs i dessa språk.
 


  

  

**Egenskaper som vi söker hos dig:**
  

  
* Orädd
  
* Resultatinriktad
  
* Strukturerad
  
* Relationsskapande
  


  

  

  

  

  

  

**Övrig information**
  

  
* Start: Omgående
  
* Omfattning: Heltid
  
* Placering: Stockholm, Årsta
  


  


 Rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av Academic Work och kundens önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten hanteras av Academic Work. Vi går igenom urvalet löpande och annonsen kan stängas ner innan tjänsten är tillsatt om vi gått över till urvals- och intervjufasen.
 


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
   

 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och annonsen kan därmed komma att tas ned innan sista ansökningsdag om det är så att vi har gått vidare till urvals- och intervjufas. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Elovade**

 Läs mer om Elovade här
   




**Bli direktrekryterad till Elovade**

 Detta är en direktrekrytering, vilket betyder att den kandidat som får tjänsten blir direktanställd av kundföretaget. Rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av Academic Work.
   




**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Petar Cakovski eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på recruitmentstockholmsouth@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15100603

title: Platform Engineer with a passion for Logging solutions | SEB, Stockholm
description:
Are you proactive, continuously improving, and eager to explore new technologies and methodologies? If so, this opportunity might be perfect for you!
   

  

*SEB is more than just a bank with an IT function. We are a progressive tech company powered by innovation and fueled by collaboration. We offer you an impressive tech stack and several technology paths.*
 We are on an exciting tech transformation journey and are seeking a talented and motivated Platform Engineer to join our Log Team. We are looking for a passionate Log Platform Engineer with a desire to work on several technology solutions in a dynamic hybrid environment (on-premises at SEB and Cloud).
   

  

**About the role:**
 As a Log Platform Engineer, you will play a crucial role in managing and optimizing our log infrastructure on-prem and contributing to our log management in Cloud. You will work alongside a team of skilled professionals to ensure seamless log management, troubleshooting, integration, and consumer satisfaction. Your technical expertise and problem-solving skills will be essential in maintaining the stability and performance of our systems.
   

  

**Key responsibilities:**
* Implement and maintain log management solutions both on-prem and on GCP
* Operate Elastic and other log solutions, including participation in on-call duties
* Continuously improve log management processes, enhance solutions, and identify opportunities for innovation
* Troubleshoot issues and develop effective solutions


**To thrive in this role, we believe you have:**
* A problem-solving mindset and troubleshooting experience
* Proven record of operations work with Elastic Cloud Enterprise or Elastic stack
* Experience with Linux
* A proactive personality with a strong sense of ownership and responsibility
* Excellent communication skills and proficiency in English
* A curious mindset, willingness to develop yourself, share your knowledge and help others


**It is meritable if you have:**
* Familiarity with Splunk or other Log platforms
* Automation skills using Ansible, Terraform, or similar languages
* Experience with Cloud technologies and tools is highly valuable


**What we offer:**
* A flat hierarchy and openness to share ideas, opinions, and points of views
* Exciting cloud transformation journey
* Collaborative and dynamic work environment
* Opportunities for professional growth and development
* Competitive compensation and benefits package


**Do you want to be part of SEB?**
 Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued.
   

  

 If you are a highly motivated individual with a strong background in log management, troubleshooting, automation, and a desire to contribute to our tech transformation journey, we encourage you to apply.
   

  

 Apply today! We review applications continuously, feel free to send in your application as soon as possible, but no later than 30th of August 2024. If you have questions about the position, please contact Rasmus Hallberg, Talent Acquisition Partner at rasmus.hallberg@seb
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEBhere** 
 : www.sebgroup.com/techcareers
   

  

 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity are crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe, or where they come from.

title: Presales Manager
description:
****Your work days are brighter here.****
 At Workday, it all began with a conversation over breakfast. When our founders met at a sunny California diner, they came up with an idea to revolutionize the enterprise software market. And when we began to rise, one thing that really set us apart was our culture. A culture which was driven by our value of putting our people first. And ever since, the happiness, development, and contribution of every Workmate is central to who we are. Our Workmates believe a healthy employee-centric, collaborative culture is the essential mix of ingredients for success in business. That’s why we look after our people, communities and the planet while still being profitable. Feel encouraged to shine, however that manifests: you don’t need to hide who you are. You can feel the energy and the passion, it's what makes us unique. Inspired to make a brighter work day for all and transform with us to the next stage of our growth journey? Bring your brightest version of you and have a brighter work day here.
   

  

**About The Team**
 As a Presales manager, you will lead and develop a team of passionate and ambitious Solution Consultants to prepare and deliver demonstrations of critical business solutions that empower our sales teams to succeed. Your team will look to you for support and guidance through every step of the sales process. As a key member of the Presales Leadership team, you will be responsible for supporting a winning strategy to best position Workday in net new or add on sales cycles. You will be responsible for hiring the best and brightest and helping them achieve success in their role and career. Ongoing coaching will be key to success of the individual and team. This is a first-line people leader role with opportunity for career growth and personal development of leadership skills
   

  

**About The Role**
* Lead an extraordinary team passionate about delivering outstanding, differentiated demos. Partner with Sales to help your team evaluate and develop sales strategy for each new opportunity that meet and exceed prospect and customer expectations and requirements.
* Hire and retain top performers. Build development plans for team members to ensure successful onboarding and continuing education of the team. Coach the team to elevate individual and team performance.
* Work with extended team members to ensure opportunity alignment. Balance the workload of the Solution Consultant team while aligning to needs of Sales.
* Keep up with industry trends and methodologies including new technologies at Workday. Provide strategic feedback to stakeholders and extended team about Workday emerging technologies.
* Establishing a strong collaborative partnership between the Presales team and the Sales organization as well as othe EMEA teams


**About You**
* Proven experience as a presales solution consultant
* Demonstrable results in leading projects/working groups/opportunity teams.
* High level of accountability in a high growth environment
* Outstanding presentation and influencing skills to C- level audience
* Ability to work with multiple collaborators and work on multiple projects in a fast-paced environment
* Excellent interpersonal skills
* Strong problem-solving and critical thinking skills
* Consistent achievement or overachievement of assigned goals and targets
* Success in mentoring coworkers in ways that allowed them to learn new skills and achieve career goals
* Collaboration with those in other roles to work towards shared goals
* Fluent in English and one of the following languages, Dannish, Finnish, Swedish or Norwegian


**Basic Qualifications**
* 3+ years managing a team of Solutions Consultants or Presales team
* 3 + years of managing teams


 Pursuant to applicable Fair Chance law, Workday will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.
   

  

 Workday is an Equal Opportunity Employer including individuals with disabilities and protected veterans.
   

  

**Are you being referred to one of our roles? If so, ask your connection at Workday about our Employee Referral process!**
 ,

title: Dataanalytiker DORA
description:
Vi söker en duktig dataanalytiker till teamet som ansvarar för implementeringen av Digital Operational Resilience Act ("DORA") för vår kund inom banksektorn.
 



 Teamets ansvarsområden kommer att sträcka sig över flera nyckelområden, inklusive insamling av affärs- och funktionskrav, inklusive sourcing, kartläggning, profilering och modellering av data, samt utveckling av en datahubb/repository. Dessutom kommer teamet att ha till uppgift att skapa en automatiserad ETL-process och en rapporteringsmotor och mekanism för att uppfylla DORA-kraven.
 



 Att gå med i Sii Sweden innebär att få tillgång till förmånerna hos ett erfaret IT-konsultföretag. Vi erbjuder ett omfattande kompensationspaket som inkluderar försäkringar, pensionsplaner och friskvårdsförmåner, från utbildningssessioner och webbseminarier till gemensamma kunskapsdelningssessioner med kollegor. Trivs i vår stabila och framåtblickande miljö, där din tillväxt och framgång är våra prioriteringar.
 



 Vi ser fram emot att ha dig ombord!
 



  





  





**Du kommer att:** 



* Bygga upp informationsregistret på enhets-, delkonsoliderad och konsoliderad nivå i enlighet med Digital Operational Resilience Act
* Samla in data från olika källor, skapa datamodeller, utforma och skriva ETL-skript och generera detaljerade rapporter
* Implementera tekniska standarder på standardmallarna för informationsregistret i samband med alla avtalsarrangemang för användning av ICT-tjänster
* Planera och schemalägga intervjuer med kundens applikationsägare och leverantörer för att identifiera DORA-databehov
* Analysera kraven på DORA-data
* Proaktivt planera och driva kravarbetet med ROI:s nyckelintressenter, framtida ROI-applikationsägare och leverantörer
* Utforma användningsfall



  





**Vi hoppas att du har:** 



* Kunskaper i Python och/eller R för dataanalys och visualisering
* Utforma och skriva ETL-skript
* Bra kunskaper i SQL för att göra sökningar och hantera databaser
* Erfarenhet av verktyg som Tableau, Power BI eller QlikView
* Expertis inom rengöring, omvandling och förberedelse av data för analys
* Kännedom om DORA-bestämmelser
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta effektivt inom tvärfunktionella team
